name: Hilton Garden Inn Oklahoma City Airport

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We loved this hotel. Everything - lobby, restaurant, corridors, rooms, bathrooms - was immaculate. Front desk people were helpful and friendly. Bed was very comfortable. The problem? The pillows...they were way too large. Made for a very restless night. My wife & I will stay here again...but we'll bring our own pillows!
reviews.title: Almost Perfect!

reviews.text: Very nice hotel, typical of Hilton Garden Inns.
reviews.title: very nice stay

likes.disliked: — wish the pool had been indoors

reviews.text: We stayed here while attending a funeral and had a very comfortable stay. The room was well equipped, including a small fridge, coffee maker and hair dryer; our room and the hotel overall were well maintained and spotless. We did not sample the breakfast buffet ($9), but it looked good. The beds were amazing and the parade of hot rods running in front of the hotel this weekend cheered us up. The free airport shuttle was quick and friendly. There are many chain and local dining options nearby. We'll be back!
reviews.title: Wonderful stay.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: PLUSES: large, well designed room; very clean; lots of pillows of different types; free parking and internet; excellent, low-noise air conditioner (with wall thermostat; not the usual under-the-window things); window that opens for ventilation; very quiet room, even when located next to the elevator.
reviews.title: Bland but more than adequate

reviews.text: MINUSES: bland decoration which is totally void of personality; uncomfortable bed (overly soft pillow top with overly hard supporting layer); no ventilation in bathroom; very audible noises from bathroom to bathroom; adequate linens but could use an upgrade for the price of the room; very expensive breakfast .
reviews.title: Mostly Excellent

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed at the Hilton Garden Inn on and off in September while helping my mom get her house ready to sell. The first couple of stays were almost flawless -- clean facility, clean room/bathroom, fresh indoor air, extremely comfortable bed, great food from room service. This was our hotel of choice each time and we didn't even consider anyplace else. We always asked for a nonsmoking room on a nonsmoking floor, and this last time, unfortunately, we did notice a smoky smell through the corridor and on our last morning, the bathroom just filled up with a smoky smell. If this hotel would change one thing, it should be better ventilation in the bathroom -- there is none!
reviews.title: Comfortable Oasis

likes.disliked: — Too many youngsters running around the pool

reviews.text: The other thing they need to do is hire more staff in the kitchen -- room service was always slow and on our last visit, we were told we couldn't order because someone called in sick and there WAS no room service that night! They did compensate with 2 coupons for a free breakfast.
reviews.title: Extremely Nice!

likes.disliked: — The price, but it was still very reasonable.

aka: Hilton Garden Inn Oklahoma City Airport Hotel Oklahoma City
description: Guests will appreciate our location just 3 miles from Will Rogers World Airport and can take advantage of our complimentary shuttle to and from the airport.
